description: This file demonstrates the use of a tool execution hook in a Python project, defining a custom toolkit class for customer database operations, a validation hook function, and setting up an agent with tools and hooks, including example responses.

classes.name: CustomerDBTools
classes.description: A custom toolkit class for customer database operations, including retrieving and deleting customer profiles.

methods.name: retrieve_customer_profile
methods.description: Retrieves a customer profile from the database and returns it as a JSON string.

methods.name: delete_customer_profile
methods.description: Deletes a customer profile from the database.

methods.name: validation_hook
methods.description: A hook function that validates calls to customer profile methods, raising errors for specific customer IDs.
